description: The French president's party loses seven MPs amid further signs of dissatisfaction in parliament.
title: France's Macron loses majority as defectors form new party
title_page: France's Macron loses majority as defectors form new party - BBC News
maintext: But the timing of the bloc's initiative raises questions. Everyone knows that after the Covid-19 crisis things will be different. There is no way on Earth that Mr Macron will be carrying on as before. Indeed most likely the new priorities will be themes such as ecology, industrial protection and higher wages for health workers - all of which the breakaway MPs would presumably regard as their own.
